name: CXTransaction
desc: An object that contains zero or more action objects to be performed by a call controller.

items.name: init(action: CXAction)
items.desc: Initializes a new transaction with the specified action.

items.name: init(actions: [CXAction])
items.desc: Initializes a new transaction with the specified actions.

items.name: var uuid: UUID
items.desc: The unique identifier of the transaction.

items.name: var isComplete: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the transaction has been completed.

items.name: var actions: [CXAction]
items.desc: The actions added to a transaction.

items.name: func addAction(CXAction)
items.desc: Adds the specified action to the transaction.
